mapper.sql: store_id, pid, store_name, mobile, longitude, latitude, store_code, province_id, city_id, county_id, address, back_url, is_useable, create_time, dml_time
mapper.update: UPDATE hqls_store SET pid = #{pid}, store_name = #{storeName}, mobile = #{mobile}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, store_code = #{storeCode}, province_id = #{provinceId}, city_id = #{cityId}, county_id = #{countyId}, address = #{address}, back_url = #{backUrl}, is_useable = #{isUseable}, create_time = #{createTime}, dml_time = #{dmlTime} WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.select: SELECT mobile FROM hqls_user where user_id=#{userId}

SELECT sto.address, sto.back_url, sto.mobile as storeName, sto.province_id as provinceId, sto.city_id as cityId, sto.county_id as countyId, sto.store_id as storeId FROM hqls_store sto LEFT JOIN hqls_user_store usto ON sto.store_id=usto.store_id WHERE usto.user_id=#{userId} order by sto.create_time
SELECT sto.mobile as storeName FROM hqls_store sto LEFT JOIN hqls_user_store usto ON sto.store_id=usto.store_id WHERE usto.user_id=#{userId}

select hqus.user_name as userName, hqus.mobile , sto.address, sto.back_url, sto.is_useable as isUseable, sto.store_name as storeName, sto.store_id as storeId FROM hqls_store sto LEFT JOIN hqls_user_store usto ON sto.store_id=usto.store_id LEFT JOIN hqls_user hqus on hqus.user_id = usto.user_id WHERE 1=1 and sto.store_name=#{storeName} and hqus.user_name=#{userName} and hqus.mobile=#{mobile} and sto.address=#{address}
